titleStmt.title: The rehearsal transpros'd, or, Animadversions upon a late book intituled, A preface, shewing what grounds there are of fears and jealousies of popery
titleStmt.author: Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.B. for the Assings [sic] of John Calvin and Theodore Beza ...

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Andrew Marvell.
An answer to Bishop Parker's preface to Bishop Bramhall's Vindication.
Imperfect: print showthrough, tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
